sentences.en: Organizational systems vary according to size, features and requirements, ranging from lineal systems to network systems.

sentences.en: Results The dose - response relationships of above mentioned both carcinogenesis factors all accord with the lineal - square model.

sentences.en: Results Their relation is lineal, that is, the more severe anxiety, the less improvement in hearing.

sentences.en: This code solves a non lineal system using the simple gaussian method.
